definition.name: NXmaterial_source
definition.doc: Base class defining a generic material source device used in a synthesis or deposition apparatus. It captures key metadata including the device name, model, source type, shutter status, and partial contributions to the growth process, such as growth rate and pressure. This class supports documentation of diverse material delivery systems in experimental setups.

field.name: name
field.doc: Name for the material source device

field.name: model
field.doc: Material source device identification code/model number

field.name: type
field.doc: Type of material source device used for deposition.

field.name: partial_growth_rate
field.doc: Contribution of this material source to the overall growth rate, expressed in units of frequency (e.g., nm/s, Ã…/s).

field.name: partial_pressure
field.doc: Partial pressure associated with this material source during the deposition process.
